data.author: Kerry Crowley
data.title: Baseball comes full circle as SF Giants honor Buster Posey, the newest Little League coach
data.description: The Giants are holding "Buster Posey Day" at Oracle Park on Saturday ahead of a game against the St. Louis Cardinals.

data.author: Sammy Approved
data.title: Happy Cinco De Mayo: Five Fast Facts About The Holiday Linked To African American History
data.description: There is one part they don't teach you in the history books: How Cinco De Mayo is linked to African American history. Take a look at five fast facts about the holiday and how Africans are tied into it all.
